FuncDef:
The remote-attestation enable command enables remote attestation (RA).
The undo remote-attestation enable command disables remote attestation.
By default, remote attestation is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Remote attestation is one of the key technologies in trusted computing solution. Remote attestation checks the reliability status of devices.
In a trusted environment, to enable remote attestation, run the remote-attestation enable command.
